data.comment: The big names in today's match at San Mames have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Bilbao.
In the minute 1, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a throw-in for Levante, close to Bilbao's area.
Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Levante territory.
In the minute 3, It's a goal kick for the home team in Bilbao.
Throw-in for Levante in their own half.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
In the minute 5, Inigo Martinez for Bilbao gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
Free kick for Levante in their own half.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for Bilbao at San Mames.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Levante's half?
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Levante in the half of Bilbao.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
At San Mames, Bilbao are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 11, Inaki Williams (Bilbao) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bilbao push forward at San Mames and Iker Muniain gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Levante defence.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Levante.
Throw-in for Bilbao at San Mames.
Ball safe as Bilbao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Levante.
Throw-in for Levante close to the penalty box.
Bilbao have a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Free kick Bilbao.
Bilbao surge into the attack at San Mames but Raul Garciaâ€™s header is off-target.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards Levante a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Levante's Enis Bardhi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bilbao goal kick.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a Bilbao throw-in in Levante's half.
In the minute 24, Can Levante get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
Throw-in Bilbao.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Levante.
In Bilbao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Levante have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
In the minute 30, Levante push upfield but Javier Alberola Rojas quickly pulls them for offside.
Ball safe as Bilbao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bilbao's Iker Muniain gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Levante defender.
In the minute 32, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Bilbao.
Ruben Vezo (Levante) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 34, Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a Bilbao throw-in in Levante's half.
Bilbao drives forward and Ander Capa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 37, Bilbao are whistled for offside.
Bilbao needs to be cautious. Levante have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Bilbao in the half of Levante.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Levante territory.
Yeray Alvarez (Bilbao) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 42, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Levante.
Bilbao have a goal kick.
Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Ander Capa (Bilbao) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at San Mames.
The second-half is underway in Bilbao.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Bilbao.
In Bilbao, Inigo Martinez (Bilbao) misses the target with a header.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards Levante a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Bilbao.
Bilbao drive upfield and Alex Berenguer gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Levante defender.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
In the minute 50, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
Raul Garcia hits the post with a header! Very nearly a goal there for Bilbao in Bilbao.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Levante.
Can Bilbao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Levante's half?
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Levante territory.
In the minute 53, Goal kick for Levante at San Mames.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a Bilbao throw-in in Levante's half.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
In the minute 54, In Bilbao Bilbao attack through Alex Berenguer. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bilbao.
Can Levante get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Levante drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards Bilbao a goal kick.
In the minute 58, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bilbao have a goal kick.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, Ruben Rochina of Levante gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bilbao.
Roger Marti is replacing Jose Luis Morales for the away team.
In the minute 63, Jorge De Frutos Sebastian is replacing Ruben Rochina for Levante at San Mames.
Free kick for Levante in their own half.
In the minute 64, Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Unai Lopez for Bilbao has been booked by Javier Alberola Rojas and receives a first yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Bilbao.
Bilbao are coming forward and Alex Berenguer gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Levante at San Mames.
In the minute 68, Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bilbao take a 1-0 lead thanks to Alex Berenguer.
Dani Garcia with an assist there.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Levante at San Mames.
The home team replace Iker Muniain with Jon Morcillo.
Gaizka Garitano (Bilbao) is making a second substitution, with Oier Zarraga replacing Unai Lopez.
In the minute 72, Goal kick for Levante at San Mames.
In Bilbao Bilbao's Raul Garcia is caught offside.
Paco Lopez is making the team's third substitution at San Mames with Dani Gomez replacing Gonzalo Melero.
In the minute 76, Bilbao to take a throw-in in Levante territory.
Important block from the Bilbao defence as Enis Bardhi fires in a strike for Levante.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a Levante throw-in in Bilbao's half.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Levante in the half of Bilbao.
Throw-in Bilbao.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Levante's half?
In the minute 77, Bilbao have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal! Inaki Williams extends Bilbao's lead to 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Jon Morcillo.
In the minute 80, Throw-in high up the field for Levante in Bilbao.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a Levante throw-in in Bilbao's half.
In Bilbao, Jorge De Frutos Sebastian of Levante is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 82, Levante have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
Bilbao needs to be cautious. Levante have an attacking throw-in.
Levante make their fourth substitution with Son replacing Enis Bardhi.
In the minute 82, The away team have replaced Jorge Miramon with Nemanja Radoja. This is the fifth substitution made today by Paco Lopez.
Can Levante get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
Inaki Williams gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bilbao.
In the minute 83, Can Bilbao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Levante's half?
Throw-in for Levante at San Mames.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Unai Vencedor is on a sub for Alex Berenguer for Bilbao.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Bilbao.
In the minute 86, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bilbao.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
Levante to take a throw-in in Bilbao territory.
In the minute 87, Son of Levante smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bilbao close to the penalty box.
Bilbao's Ander Capa breaks free at San Mames. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 88, Levante have a goal kick.
Free kick for Levante in their own half.
Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Levante.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
In Bilbao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
Levante have a dangerous throw-in.
Javier Alberola Rojas blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
Gaizka Garitano (Bilbao) is making a fourth substitution, with Asier Villalibre replacing Inaki Williams.
